title: Error when building pytorch from source with CUDA support
body_html:
I get the following error when following the instructions from the README.md file

[ 52%] Building NVCC (Device) object CMakeFiles/THCUNN.dir/THCUNN_generated_SpatialDilatedConvolution.cu.o
/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/../include/c++/v1/type_traits(1195): error: more than one instance of overloaded function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test [with _Tp=half]" matches the argument list:
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(float) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(char) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(int) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(unsigned int) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(long) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(unsigned long) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(long long) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(unsigned long long) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(long double) [with _Tp=half]"
            argument types are: (half)
          detected during:
            instantiation of class "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp> [with _Tp=half]" 
/Users/saibhargavyalamanchi/pytorch/torch/lib/THCUNN/SpatialCrossMapLRN.cu(60): here
            instantiation of "void LRNComputeOutput(int, const Dtype *, const Dtype *, Dtype, Dtype *) [with Dtype=half]" 
/Users/saibhargavyalamanchi/pytorch/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/SpatialCrossMapLRN.cu(42): here

1 error detected in the compilation of "/var/folders/44/229xsycx5g57154zvkrr9t3c0000gn/T//tmpxft_00017da9_00000000-11_SpatialCrossMapLRN.compute_61.cpp1.ii".
CMake Error at THCUNN_generated_SpatialCrossMapLRN.cu.o.cmake:267 (message):
  Error generating file
  /Users/saibhargavyalamanchi/pytorch/torch/lib/build/THCUNN/CMakeFiles/THCUNN.dir//./THCUNN_generated_SpatialCrossMapLRN.cu.o

Prior to this, I ran xcode-select --install.
Any hints on how to resolve this?

I get the following error when following the instructions from the README.md file
[ 52%] Building NVCC (Device) object CMakeFiles/THCUNN.dir/THCUNN_generated_SpatialDilatedConvolution.cu.o

Prior to this, I ran xcode-select --install.
Any hints on how to resolve this?
body:
I get the following error when following the instructions from the README.md file 

```
[ 52%] Building NVCC (Device) object CMakeFiles/THCUNN.dir/THCUNN_generated_SpatialDilatedConvolution.cu.o
/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/../include/c++/v1/type_traits(1195): error: more than one instance of overloaded function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test [with _Tp=half]" matches the argument list:
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(float) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(char) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(int) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(unsigned int) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(long) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(unsigned long) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(long long) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(unsigned long long) [with _Tp=half]"
            function "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp>::__test(long double) [with _Tp=half]"
            argument types are: (half)
          detected during:
            instantiation of class "std::__1::__numeric_type<_Tp> [with _Tp=half]" 
/Users/saibhargavyalamanchi/pytorch/torch/lib/THCUNN/SpatialCrossMapLRN.cu(60): here
            instantiation of "void LRNComputeOutput(int, const Dtype *, const Dtype *, Dtype, Dtype *) [with Dtype=half]" 
/Users/saibhargavyalamanchi/pytorch/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/SpatialCrossMapLRN.cu(42): here

1 error detected in the compilation of "/var/folders/44/229xsycx5g57154zvkrr9t3c0000gn/T//tmpxft_00017da9_00000000-11_SpatialCrossMapLRN.compute_61.cpp1.ii".
CMake Error at THCUNN_generated_SpatialCrossMapLRN.cu.o.cmake:267 (message):
  Error generating file
  /Users/saibhargavyalamanchi/pytorch/torch/lib/build/THCUNN/CMakeFiles/THCUNN.dir//./THCUNN_generated_SpatialCrossMapLRN.cu.o
```

Prior to this, I ran `xcode-select --install`. 
Any hints on how to resolve this?
